name: Absinthe Cocktail
directions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass
Fill with ice
Stir until chilled
Strain into coupe
Twist the lemon peel over the glass to express the oils
Discard the peel

name: Americano
garnish: 1 orange half-wheel, 1 small bottle of cold seltzer
directions: Pour the Campari and vermouth into glass
Add 3 1¼-in ice cubes
Stir for 3 seconds
Add the cold seltzer
Stir once
Garnish with the orange half-wheel
Serve with a bottle of seltzer

name: Argyle
directions: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass
Fill the mixing glass with ice and stir
Strain the drink into a coupe
Express the oils of the lemon twist over the glass
Rub the twist on the rim of the glass and drop it into the glass, leaving the flesh side up

name: Augie March
directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice
Strain into a coupe
Garnish with the cherry

name: Barnaby Jones
directions: Dry-shake all the ingredients
Shake again with ice
Double strain into a chilled coupe
Garnish with a few grates of cinnamon

name: Billingsley Punch
directions: In a pitcher, muddle the sugar cubes with 4 oz of the Club Soda until the sugar is fully broken up
Add the remaining ingredients (except the remaining Club Soda)
Fill the pitcher ¾ full with 1¼-in ice cubes
Stir until cold
Strain into a punch bowl over 1 large block of ice
Top with the remaining 4 oz of Club Soda
Garnish with the grapefruit crescents
Serve with a ladle and punch glasses

name: Bohemia
directions: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass

name: Maple Julep
directions: Put the rye and maple syrup in a julep tin
Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice
Stir with a teaspoon, churing the ice, for about 10 seconds, holding the tin by the rim so the entire tin can eventually frost up
Add more crushed ice to fill the tin ⅔ full
Stir until the tin is completely frosted
Add more crushed ice to form a cone above the rim
Garnish with the mint bouquet in the center of the ice
Serve with a straw

name: Margarita
directions: Rim half of a double rocks glass with kosher salt
Shake all the ingredients with ice
Strain into the rimmed glass over 1¼-in ice cubes
Garnish with the lime wedge

Fill the mixing glass with ice and stir

name: Perfect Manhattan
directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice
Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass
Express the lemon twist over the drink, then set it on the edge of glass
editorsNotes: The term "perfect" refers to a drink that contains equal parts sweet and dry vermouth.

directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice
Strain into a coupe

directions: Stir with ice
Stir until cold
Strain over a 2-in ice cube in a chilled single rocks glass
Garnish with an apple fan sprinkled with sea salt

name: Smoked Julep
directions: Put all the ingredients in a julep tin
Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice
Stir with a teaspoon, churing the ice, for about 10 seconds, holding the tin by the rim so the entire tin can eventually frost up
Add more crushed ice to fill the tin ⅔ full
Stir until the tin is completely frosted
Add more crushed ice to form a cone above the rim
Garnish with the apple fan and mint bouquet in the center of the ice
Serve with a straw

name: South Slope
directions: Shake with ice
Strain into a chilled coupe
Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Spring Sting
directions: In a mixing glass, combine all the ingredients
Using a melon baller, cut a dime-size ball out of the cucumber
Fill the mixing glass with 1¼-in ice cubes and stir
Strain the drink into a Nick & Nora glass using a hawthorne strainer
Skewer the cucumber and garnish the drink

name: St. Columb's Rill
directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice
Strain into a coupe

name: Sunset at Gowanus
directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice
Strain into a coupe

name: Sweet and Vicious

Add the remaining ingredients
Stir over ice

name: Swollen Gland
directions: Shake with ice
Fine-strain into a chilled, Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe-rinsed coupe

name: Ty Cobbler
directions: In a shaker, muddle the cherries and sugar cube
Add the remaining ingredients
Dry-shake
Dump into a double rocks glass filled with crushed ice
Garnish with the orange wheel

name: Vagabond

ingredients.name: Lustau Pedro Ximénez San Emilio Sherry

directions: Combine all the ingredients except the absinthe in a mixing glass
Rinse a single rocks glass with 6 sprays of absinthe from an atomizer
Fill the mixing glass with ice and stir
Strain the drink into the single rocks glass
Express the oils from the lemon twist over the drink
Discard the twist

directions: Stir all the ingredients over ice
Strain into a double rocks glass

name: Whiskey Highball
directions: Pour the whiskey into a Highball glass
Add a 1¼-in ice cube

name: White Birch Fizz

Strain into a chilled Highball glass

Garnish with a spritz of Suze Aperitif
